amendment.description: An amendment numbered 169 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the provision of gender transition procedures, including surgery or medication, through the Exceptional Family Member Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
